name: Roma Potiki
bio: Roma Potiki is a Maori (Te Rarawa, Te Aupouri, Ngaai Rangitihi) poet, playwright, performer, and visual artist. She was Maori arts coordinator of the 1998 New Zealand International Festival of the Arts as well as a visual artist. She is the author of Stones in Her Mouth (1992) and Shaking the Tree (1998) and the play Going Home (1996). She collaborated with Robyn Kahukiwa on Oriori: a Māori Child is Born: From Conception to Birth (1999).
